description:
I think Ziggy gives Stash a run for the Ultimate Twink award! (Hmmm..that might be an interesting pairing!)
Ziggy is a Dead Head and a Marley fan, so chose his stage name based on that, and not the old cartoon character!
He is 18, and was still in high school when we filmed this, but I waited to air it until he was out of school. Many of us know High School is too brutal.
Ziggy ended up in my studio via a referral from a referral.
While hunting online, He'd been searching for girls to have sex with. A local guy spotted him and asked him to do some photos (making sure he was 18 first..he does look young!). Well, one thing lead to another, and I think Ziggy got his dick sucked a couple times. Thus planting a seed tht he could do porn.
Ziggy is very easy going, very smart, a bit of trouble-maker(In his own words), and you can tell comes from good Jewish/Polish/German stock.
He is sweet as can be and I think he will be back for more. Well at least to have his dick sucked. Pretty sure I am gonna have Stash do it just in case it is his only other "guy-on-guy" scene he feels comfortable with doing. I don't want to miss putting the two of them in the same room for a total twink twinning!
title: Ziggy - Solo
